mapper.insert: insert into t_coupon (couponName, sourceName, percent, createTime, beginTime, endTime, couponNum, userId) values (#{couponName}, #{sourceName}, #{percent}, now(), #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{couponNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from t_coupon where couponNum = #{couponNum} limit 1
select count(couponId) from t_coupon where couponNum = #{couponNum}

select * from t_coupon where 1 = 1
and (couponName like CONCAT("%", #{couponInfo}, "%") or sourceName like CONCAT("%", #{couponInfo}, "%") or couponNum like CONCAT("%", #{couponInfo}, "%"))
and status = #{status}
order by createTime desc
